 ![Interaktionsdesign och UX book cover](https://www.studentlitteratur.se/pub_images/large/9789144121058.jpg) 
This book is one of the most popular and influential texts on interaktionsdesign och UX in Sweden and beyond. It covers the theoretical foundations, practical methods, and ethical implications of user experience design, with examples and case studies from various domains and contexts. It also provides tips and tools for conducting user research, prototyping, testing, and evaluating your designs.
